node.excerpt: Highlight and annotate directly on webpages.
Easily find them on your New Tab.
Share your throught trails or get inspired from 'The Witty Folk'.

intro.html:
Having trouble finding your notes on time?

Check your google drive, or maybe that dropbox account you created last month. What about your bookmarks, did you check them?

... Still searching?

node.title: Developers
node.description: Keep all your code snippets in one place, easy to find when you need them!

node.title: Writers
node.description: Save text highlights from the web and collect inspiration for your next big article.

node.title: Everyone
node.description: Use it for your reading lists, your web notes, your recipes or all of the above. There are no rules.
